rule:
Key words and phrases emphasized using `` tags must be present inside each corresponding `

` tag.
input: Leaves are green. Flowers are fragrant. Fruits are sweet.
output:
Leaves are green.

Flowers are fragrant.

Fruits are sweet.

Leaves are green.

Flowers are fragrant.

Fruits are sweet.

` tag includes one `` tag. - Each `

` tag also contains at least one `` tag. This indicates that the output directly complies with the requirements specified in the description. There is no issue found regarding the number of `

` tag. No violations of the description have been observed. OK
